pullrequest.title: Proposal: Updating to Visual Studio 2017 and improving Windows CI

content.raw: And you're right, we could move forward on merging `ign-math` and `ign-common` with no issues since they're targeting `CMakeRefactor*` branches. The only catch is that the `CMakeRefactor*` pull requests will get bigger, and it might not be obvious what part of the diff already made it through the review process.
content.html: And you're right, we could move forward on merging ign-math and ign-common with no issues since they're targeting CMakeRefactor* branches. The only catch is that the CMakeRefactor* pull requests will get bigger, and it might not be obvious what part of the diff already made it through the review process.
